ObjectDescriptionVB8Bit.text: There must be over 100 NES games here.

ObjectDescriptionVBMags.text: Below the counter are various magazines.

ObjectDescriptionVBGen.text: Phantasy Star II looks interesting.|Is it really worth $70 though?

ObjectDescriptionVBTG.text: $400 to play Ys I&II? It's still tempting.

ObjectDescriptionVBGB.text: This portable gaming thing might take off.

ObjectDescriptionVBPC.text: PC games with over- sized boxes.

ObjectDescriptionFCBFirepit.text: It doesn't look like it was used recently.

ObjectDescriptionFCBTent.text: It looks kind of cozy in there.

ObjectDescriptionFCBGunCase.text: They sell everything at the mall now.

ObjectDescriptionSVideoVideoWall.text: Hundreds of VHS tapes line the wall.

ObjectDescriptionSVideoVideoRack.text: These appear to be the new releases.

ObjectDescriptionMannequin.text: Why are you trying to touch them?

ObjectDescriptionCPlanetTapes.text: Hundreds of cassette tapes by genre.

ObjectDescriptionCPlanetCDs.text: All the new music is coming in these now.

ObjectDescriptionCavernArcade00.text: 'Xenowave'|Defend the space colony from swarms of hungry aliens.

ObjectDescriptionCavernArcade01.text: 'Racin'|Featuring more polygons than any other game.

ObjectDescriptionCavernArcade02.text: 'Glorious Golf'|The most realistic golf simulator ever made for 1-4 players.

ObjectDescriptionCavernArcade03.text: 'Comic Book Man'|Save the fictional big city from the evil clown brigade.

ObjectDescriptionCavernArcade04.text: 'The Bash Show'|Bludgeon people with household items to win prizes.

ObjectDescriptionCavernArcade05.text: 'Super Secret Agent'|A nuclear weapon has been smuggled out of Russia, go find it.

ObjectDescriptionCavernArcade06.text: 'Mystical Duke'|Save the kingdom from the dark wizard and his army of trolls.

ObjectDescriptionCavernArcade07.text: 'Street Beat 3'|Your girlfriend has been kidnapped by thugs & lowlifes.

ObjectDescriptionCavernArcade08.text: 'DigiFigher'|Cutting-edge digital graphics that look totally real.

ObjectDescriptionPlant.text: It's hard to believe this survives here.

ObjectDescriptionTBooksRomance.text: If you enjoy romance books then check out|'Too Good Too Be Real' by Melonie Johnson.

ObjectDescriptionTBooksHistory.text: There might be a useful reference here.

ObjectDescriptionTBooksCooking.text: Low-fat cooking seems to be the hot fad.

ObjectDescriptionTBooksRPG.text: So there's a second edition now..|Wait, did I know there was a first edition?

ObjectDescriptionTBooksNewAge.text: This the crystals and alien abuduction section.

ObjectDescriptionTBooksTechnology.text: C++ programming looks too high level.

ObjectDescriptionTrashCan.text: It looks really gross in there.

ObjectDescriptionPogoDawgTable.text: This obviously hasn't been cleaned recently.

ObjectDescriptionPogoDawgTrash.text: The customers here are way too lazy.

ObjectDescriptionNShackCase.text: Display case with fancy nut platters.

ObjectDescriptionTLodgeDisks.text: Computer disks in many different formats.

ObjectDescriptionTLodgeRadios.text: Radios and cassette player in many colors.

ObjectDescriptionTLodgeTVs.text: Portable TVs for people on the go.

ObjectDescriptionTLodgeClocks.text: Several dozen styles of alarm clocks.

ObjectDescriptionCenterFireplace.text: It doesn't appear to have a fire.

ObjectDescriptionEWHallTree.text: This is close to hitting the ceiling.

ObjectDescriptionWWAudioWall.text: Car radios, some with CD players.

ObjectDescriptionWWAudioWoodStereo.text: This must weigh well over 100 pounds.

ObjectDescriptionWWApplianceFridge.text: Do I need to keep anything cold?

ObjectDescriptionBasementBed.text: It looks like it's been used recently.

ObjectDescriptionBasementLadder.text: This leads back to the main floor.

ObjectDescriptionBasementComputer1.text: There's a list of locations in the mall and menus to control the background music.

ObjectDescriptionBasementComputer2.text: It looks like this one controls the climate.

ObjectDescriptionDeadArcadeGame.text: This is just good for parts now.

ObjectDescriptionCavernBackroomLadder.text: This appears to lead to a basement level.
